001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.*;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
006
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.List;
009
010public class FullyConnectedLayer implements ConvolutionalNetworkLayer {
011
012    private final ConvolutionalShape inputShape;
013    private final ConvolutionalShape outputShape;
014    private final NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork;
015
016    public static FullyConnectedLayer create(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, int dimensions, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
017        ConvolutionalShape outputShape = new ConvolutionalShape(dimensions, 1);
018        List<InputNeuron> inputNodes = new ArrayList<>();
019        for (int i = 0; i < inputShape.getElements().length(); i++) {
020            inputNodes.add(new InputNeuron("Input(" + i + ")"));
021        }
022        List<Neuron> outputNodes = new ArrayList<>();
023        for (int i = 0; i < dimensions; i++) {
024            outputNodes.add(ActivationsCachedNeuron.create("Neuron(" + i + ")", inputNodes, activationFunction));
025        }
026        return new FullyConnectedLayer(inputShape, outputShape, new DefaultNeuralNetwork(List.of(inputNodes, outputNodes)));
027    }
028
029    public FullyConnectedLayer(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, ConvolutionalShape outputShape, NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
030        this.inputShape = inputShape;
031        this.outputShape = outputShape;
032        this.neuralNetwork = neuralNetwork;
033    }
034
035    @Override
036    public ConvolutionalShape getInputShape() {
037        return inputShape;
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public ConvolutionalShape getOutputShape() {
042        return outputShape;
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public ConvolutionalShape transform(ConvolutionalShape input) {
047        Array<Float> estimate = neuralNetwork.estimate(input.getElements());
048        return outputShape.withElements(estimate);
049    }
050
051}
